# backAction

**Instance Property**

The back action for the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backAction: UIAction? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If a back button already appears in the navigation bar, setting this property replaces its action without modifying its appearance. Otherwise, setting this property generates a back button with the image or title from the action you specify, unless you use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/ItemStyle/editor] navigation style.

## Configuring the Back button

- **backBarButtonItem**: The bar button item for adding a Back button to the navigation bar.
- **backButtonTitle**: The custom title of the Back button.
- **backButtonDisplayMode**: The display mode of the Back button.
- **UINavigationItem.BackButtonDisplayMode**: Constants that describe the display modes of the Back button.
- **hidesBackButton**: A Boolean value that determines whether the navigation item hides the Back button.
- **setHidesBackButton(_:animated:)**: Hides or shows the Back button, optionally animating the transition.
